tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE STEM_Events (
  event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name STRING,
  event_type STRING,
  event_date DATE,
  event_location STRING
)

CREATE TABLE STEM_Events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    event_location VARCHAR(255),
    event_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Workshops (
    workshop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    workshop_name VARCHAR(255),
    workshop_date DATE,
    workshop_instructor VARCHAR(255),
    workshop_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Workshops (
  workshop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  workshop_name VARCHAR(255),
  workshop_date DATE,
  workshop_duration INT,
  workshop_instructor VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE STEM_Events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    event_date DATE,
    event_time TIME,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    organizer VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Workshops (
    workshop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    workshop_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    workshop_date DATE,
    workshop_time TIME,
    instructor VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_date DATE,
    timing TIME,
    organizer VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    participant_email VARCHAR(100),
    participant_phone VARCHAR(20),
    registered_event_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (registered_event_id) REFERENCES STEM_Events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE STEM_Events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  event_date DATE,
  event_location VARCHAR(255),
  event_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Workshops (
  workshop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  workshop_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  workshop_date DATE,
  workshop_facilitator VARCHAR(255),
  workshop_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Extracurricular_Activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  activity_date DATE,
  activity_location VARCHAR(255),
  activity_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  participant_email VARCHAR(255),
  participant_phone VARCHAR(15),
  participant_role VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Registrations (
  registration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  participant_id INT,
  registration_date DATE,
  registration_status VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES STEM_Events(event_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES Participants(participant_id)
);
